title: Allow switching between big and small numbers easily
body:
When adding small numbers, sometimes it becomes obvious that that number can only be in one box, and so I need to switch to big numbers, enter it, then back to small numbers to continue working through the puzzle.

I'd like to propose allowing to enter big numbers when in small numbers mode by long-pressing in a box, and vice versa. I think this will help make the app more user-friendly.

title: Translation to Polish language
body: Translation to Polish language

title: Update strings.xml
body: Rechtschreibfehler behoben

title: Adding an 16x16 variant
body:
Maybe you could add an 16x16 variant?
I find the 12x12 a bit wired because the layout is not square...

title: Allow creating personal Sudoku puzzles
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body:
Hello,
I've been using your app for some time and really like it. I'd really like to be able to add personal puzzles in order to be able to solve them in your neat interface.
Thanks

title: Highlight cells with distinct color
body: It would be helpful if we could see cells populated originally in one color, cells populated by us in another color, and cells penciled in with a given value in a third color.

title: fix build outside Android Studio
body:
gradle needs to know where to get the com.android.tools.build:gradle
plugin, this is only available form the google() repo now.

Also make ./gradlew executable.

title: Main screen for play is broken
body:
Phone : Wiko Ozzy
Android version : 4.2.2
App version : 2.1.1
Language : French

### Scenario :
Open the application
Open a new 9*9 game

### Expected behaviour :
Game is playable

### Current behaviour :
Screen is broken
  
![screenshot_2018-01-05-00-59-11](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/13867472/34590051-ad55050e-f1b4-11e7-8b72-528944e89909.png)

title: Copyright violation
body:
Hi @SecUSo

I found [this app](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.kesk.tahk) and also [this one](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.vana.kaabu) on the Google Play Store. This guy just took your source code, added some ads in it or made it payable and put it on the Store, without warning this is free software...

As you are the owner of the source code, feel free to open a request to google [here](https://support.google.com/legal/contact/lr_dmca?product=googleplay) to remove the false app from the Store, if it's your wish ;)

Don't forget to tell Google that:

* The app is licensed under GNU GPL v3 license and this guy is violating it;
* He is falsely claiming he made the app.

title: high CPU-usage & unlimited increase of battery temperature
body:
I recognized a constant high CPU usage, which results in a unlimited increase and harmful battery temperature. I tried to configure the app to minimalistic features but this doesn't solve the issue.

On the Fairphone 2 it takes about 5 min and on the HTC One m8 it takes about 15 min to resch > 42Â°C. Both devices running LineageOS 14.1

It's pity, because this is the best Sudoku app i ever played on Android and i would be totally happy to play one round without a break.

title: Android automatic refactor - ObsoleteLayoutParam
body:
Hi (again),

I am developing a tool to automatically refactor Android applications with the goal of improving energy efficiency.
This pull request has the changes generated while applying the rule "ObsoleteLayoutParam".

While developing your application's views you might be specifying attributes in a view's artefact that are not necessary due to the nature of its parent. In this PR, those attributes were replaced by a comment.

I have made a previous validation of the changes and they seem correct.
Unfortunately, this tool is not able keep the original whitespace of the files, so comparison without ignoring whitespace might be confusing.
Please consider the changes and let me know if you agree with them.

Best,
Luis

title: Add layout for 6"/7" tablets
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
Hi,
I have Sudoku v2.0.1 from fdroid running on a fire tablet 7" with Android 5.1.1.

- The grid has different border sizes, sometimes gray
- The Notes are pixelated
- Numbers on the buttons are too small
- Border of the buttons in the last row are too big

title: Add Hungarian translation
label: [Label(name="translation")]
body: Translated the English version of strings.xml into Hungarian, and removed the non-translatable strings.

title: autosave games
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: because of #8, i recently saw my phone power down in the middle of a "difficult"-level game. when i restarted the phone, the game was gone!!! i was expecting the game to be automatically saved because there is a "continue" button on the main screen.

title: Numbers vanish in Landscape Mode
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body: This should be fixed for the next version.

title: Adjust difficulty levels
label: [Label(name="bug")]
body:
The levels in Sudoku are too hard compared to other applications and "offline" Sudokus.
The levels must be adjusted.

title: Update french translations
body: Lot of mistakes corrected, still requires changes for consistency (mainly "case" vs of "champ")

title: Warn of obvious mistakes
label: [Label(name="enhancement")]
body: Great app. It would be nice if the app would mark obvious wrong entries (e.g. same number already exists in line, column or square) and thus warn the user about them. If you say this would not be desirable for everyone because of higher/lower difficulty it could be configurable and either be on or off by default.

title: Not working in RTL locales
body: It shows only one column and controls are more working on RTL locals

body:
Sudoku used 7% of my battery in 3 minutes.

Sony Xperia Z1
Kitkat 4.4.4

And to finish thank you for this app...
